mapper.sql: id, student_id, course_id, read_type_id, word_id, type, push, memory_strength, error_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select v.id id, v.word word, v.syllable syllable, v.word_chinese wordChinese, v.sound_mark wordyj, rw.memory_strength memoryStrength, v.recordpicurl recordpicurl from read_word rw, vocabulary v where rw.word_id = v.id and rw.student_id = #{studentId} and rw.course_id = #{courseId} and rw.memory_strength < 1 and rw.push <= now() and rw.type = #{type} order by rw.push desc limit 1
